headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Double Rewards on A Superyacht Life, Hidden Caches, and More
content:
All six A Superyacht Life Missions are dishing out 2X GTA and RP. If youâ€™re currently yacht-less and looking for a taste of the high life, visit Docktease to pick up a Galaxy Superyacht at a 50% discount.

Keep your eyes, ears and sonar out for Hidden Caches and Treasure Chests, as finding both will land you twice the usual cash and RP.
